text:
You are about to presented with some cards.

You can choose which to learn at whatever pace you like.

You will be tested on your knowledge of the content on the cards later.

For some of the cards, your scores will be compared to other participants.

These cards will have a red background behind the text.

You will not be competing with other participants for the other cards.

If you have any questions do ask the researcher before starting.

You will have 30 minutes to revise the cards.
This is the start of a new experiment.
